summary.para: Specifies a UMS scheduler thread, UMS worker thread, or non-UMS thread. The function uses this structure.
summary.blockquote: [!WARNING] As of Windows 11, user-mode scheduling is not supported. All calls fail with the error ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED.

member.name: UMS_SYSTEM_THREAD_INFORMATION.UmsVersion
member.summary: The UMS version. This member must be UMS_VERSION.

member.name: UMS_SYSTEM_THREAD_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.IsUmsSchedulerThread
member.summary: A bitfield that specifies a UMS scheduler thread. If IsUmsSchedulerThread is set, IsUmsWorkerThread must be clear.

member.name: UMS_SYSTEM_THREAD_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.IsUmsWorkerThread
member.summary: A bitfield that specifies a UMS worker thread. If IsUmsWorkerThread is set, IsUmsSchedulerThread must be clear.
